title: Was the attack on United States soldiers in Niger "worst than Benghazi "?
subtitle: In view of the paucity of information available after two weeks of ambush by hardliners against United States troops in the Niger in October 2017, comparisons with Benghazi may be somewhat premature.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The killing of four American soldiers in an ambush by Islamic fighters in Niger in October 2017 was a much worse disaster than the 2012 attack on American diplomatic facilities in Benghazi.
